title: MAFS' Martha Kalifatidis flaunts her bikini body in Mexico with boyfriend
text:
Temperatures are soaring in Mexico this week, and it's all thanks to genetically-blessed MAFS couple Martha Kalifatidis and Michael Brunelli.

The reality TV stars, who recently celebrated their one-year anniversary, enjoyed a sunbathing session at their resort in San José del Cabo on Saturday.

Martha, 31, struggled to contain her ample assets in a skimpy white bikini top, which she paired with matching bottoms and a crucifix necklace.

It's getting hot in here! Temperatures are soaring in Mexico this week, and it's all thanks to genetically-blessed MAFS couple Martha Kalifatidis and Michael Brunelli (pictured)

She accessorised with designer sunglasses and tied a loose white sarong around her waist, before later discarding it.

Meanwhile, schoolteacher Michael showcased his chiseled abs by going shirtless in just a pair of bright pink boardshorts.

He protected himself from the sun by wearing a bucket hat and carried the couple's belongings in a net beach bag.

Sizzling: The reality TV stars, who recently celebrated their one-year anniversary, enjoyed a sunbathing session at their resort in San José del Cabo on Saturday

Praise the Lord! Martha, 31, struggled to contain her ample assets in a skimpy white bikini top, which she paired with matching bottoms and a crucifix necklace

Getting comfortable! She tied a loose white sarong around her waist, before later discarding it

Martha and Michael jetted off to Mexico last Tuesday.

The couple had only just reunited in Australia, after Martha had spent a month in Greece on holiday with her family.

She documented her European vacation on Instagram, sharing daily photo updates of herself posing in skimpy bikinis.

Wedgie alert! At one stage, Martha reached behind to adjust the back of her bikini bottoms

So hot she needs to cool down! Martha made sure to stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water

Holiday mode! Martha and Michael, who met on Married At First Sight season six, jetted off to Mexico last Tuesday

Another vacation! The couple had only just reunited in Australia, after Martha had spent a month in Greece on holiday with her family

Meanwhile, the pair recently celebrated their one-year anniversary, after filming their MAFS wedding day in September 2018.

They are one of two remaining couples from this year's season of the reality show, alongside Cameron Merchant and Jules Robinson.

Married At First Sight returns to Channel Nine next year

Hot for teacher! Michael showcased his chiseled abs by going shirtless in just a pair of bright pink boardshorts

Sun safe! He protected himself from the sun by wearing a bucket hat and carried the couple's belongings in a net beach bag

Still going strong! Martha and Michael are one of two remaining couples from this year's season of Married At First Sight
description: Temperatures are soaring in Mexico this week, and it's all thanks to genetically-blessed MAFS couple Martha Kalifatidis and Michael Brunelli.
authors: Jo Scrimshire For Daily Mail Australia
